title: bots have ruined the game experience for me im not playing until i see bots gone
body:
I am just a casual player and bots have taken over just about every aram game I play in
they constantly die/feed and destroy any competitive part of the game
I know riot probably will take no notice, they clearly do not care
just my 2 cents
bye riot your game is dying
